references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the core generative model used in GeNIe for augmenting images.
This paper introduces the Mixup data augmentation technique which GeNIe is compared against.

references.paper_title: Autoaugment: Learning augmentation policies from data
references.reason: This paper introduces AutoAugment, a learning-based data augmentation method which is compared against GeNIe.

references.paper_title: A closer look at few-shot classification
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work on few-shot learning, the main experimental setting of GeNIe.

references.paper_title: Optimization as a model for few-shot learning
references.reason: This paper is another foundational work on few-shot learning providing theoretical support for GeNIe's experimental design.
